flawed_nl_solution:
She has used 32 ounces on 8-ounce glasses because 4 x 8 = 32
She has used 30 ounces on the 5-ounce glasses because 6 x 5 = 30
She has used 62 ounces in total because 32 + 30 = <<32+30=62>>62
She has 56 ounces left because 122 - 62 = <<122-62=56>>56
She can fill fifteen four-ounce glasses because 56 / 4 = <<56/4=14>>14
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 56. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
